item.description:
Meet up at Boston Rock Gym (BRG) in Woburn for the Social Outcast Club Potluck and Ice Climbing Presentation with optional gym climbing beforehand. This is a great opportunity to meet more of the BRG community, make more friends and climbing partners, and gain some great tips! For those who live and/or work closer to this gym, BRG offers a very cool hometown community of climbers (you don't get lost in the crowd here), and very high quality routes/problems and instruction for climbers of all abilities.

No need to RSVP, can just show up.

Schedule of events for Sunday:

10:00 am - 6:00 pm: Normal Gym Climbing Hours

8:00 - 10:00 pm: Social Outcast Club Potluck and Presentation. Bring food or drink to share. Presentation topics include a recent trip report from a local climber about exploring and climbing in Patagonia and Antartica, the NE Classic Ice Climb Dracula, and tips for dressing/preparing for ice climbing. More info: http://bostonrockgym.wordpress.com/2013/01/10/social-outcast-installment-4-ice-climbing/

Cost: Free for BRG members, $16 day pass for non-members (even if you come just for potluck presentation, so combining with climbing at the gym that day stretches your dollars further).

For directions or more info about the gym, check their website: http://www.bostonrockgym.com
item.how_to_find_us: See directions in main event description
item.name: BRG Social Outcast Club Presentation & Potluck
